mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (post_id, parent_id, writer_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{postId}, #{parentId}, #{writerId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_id, parent_id, writer_id, content, created_at, updated_at FROM comments WHERE post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY IF(parent_id IS NULL, id, parent_id), created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE comments SET content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comments WHERE id = #{id} AND writer_id = #{writerId}
